Attribute.Name: Description
Attribute.Value: Set GPIO pin directions where 0 is Out pin and 1 is In pin

Channel.Name: GPIO1Dir
Channel.Description: Set gpio pins direction I/O 0- output; 1-input

Channel.Name: GPIO2Dir
Channel.Description: Set gpio pins direction I/O 0- output; 1-input

Channel.Description: Set gpio pins direction I/O 0- output; 1-input

Channel.Description: Set gpio pins direction I/O 0- output; 1-input
